DOC.brief_summary: Study hypothesis : new , low polymerization stress flowable composite performs differently conventional , highly fill composite fill material use restorative small cavity back teeth . Study evaluate clinical performance low shrink flowable composite fill material , compare conventional , highly fill composite restorative use permanently fill small cavity molar premolar teeth adult patient .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study New Flowable Composite Restorative Adult Teeth
DOC.detailed_description: The study evaluate clinical performance low shrink flowable composite fill material compare conventional , highly fill composite . The study material use restore small cavity molar premolar teeth adult patient .
DOC.criteria: 19 year old must give write consent good general health available require followup visit least 28 teeth rampant , uncontrolled caries advance , untreated periodontal disease heavy use smoking tobacco ( 2 pack equivalent day ) chew tobacco systemic local disorder contraindicate dental procedure need study evidence xerostomia evidence severe bruxing clenching , need TMJ related therapy pregnant time screen tooth restoration know sensitivity acrylate related material
